channel.title: Client help asap plzz
channel.description:
hi when i start up david scape client i get this error when i try to login?
[code]PiwoScape 508 Client Install Hamachi to PLAY! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ItemDef.recolor(ItemDef.java:100) at Applet_Sub1.method18(Applet_Sub1.java:413) at Class44.method492(Class44.java:515) at client.method35(client.java:385) at client.method33(client.java:761) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ItemDef.recolor(ItemDef.java:100) at Applet_Sub1.method18(Applet_Sub1.java:545) at Class44.method492(Class44.java:515) at client.method35(client.java:385) at client.method33(client.java:761) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ItemDef.recolor(ItemDef.java:100) at Applet_Sub1.method18(Applet_Sub1.java:534) at Class44.method492(Class44.java:515) at client.method35(client.java:385) at client.method33(client.java:761) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:790 Applet_Sub1:1125 Applet_Sub1 :157 Thread:619 | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true [/code]
